replies.body:
Alright, sorry I took a while. Weddings OP.
First of all do you mean annotations?
the ones on the left of the vid.

Annotations- 
Are simple text that you can add to youtube vids.
Basically while in video manager you *In youtube*
you can "Add Annotation" you can put text in the box of it if you wish, you can move it around to put it where you want it.
Change the shape and size, and even add links so when they click on it. It will take them to that link.

Now, the thing on the right.
That banner/Image of text.

In a program that he has used to edit the vid, lets just say Adobe After Effects.
he can create that image/Text in Photoshop or another program. and slide that in the video in after effects.
Same thing when he showed the runes/Masteries.

As a little bonus, im not sure how this is done exactly.
But twitch/Streamers that have all that stuff on there hudd, is a Whole bunch of images, overlayed on each other.

As some streaming programs allow you to move and slide images on the screen that is being recorded.
So pro streamers can make there stuff look fancy.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q2iIVOGyTt4&list=PLZRrmLBrBbXFzVyMqsgy_Rtg3BvhwxpFW

Is something that I found, that is after effects and just some basic stuff with it.

no ive found out what i needed an it wasent tht
Glad ya did.

No, league doesnt have mods.
there are third party programs however riot will perma ban anyone who sues them.
Like scripting/Botting.

Script programs will automatically make someone dodge a skill shot, even if they are already in an action.
It will cancel everything and move out of all potential harm.

Bot programs are the worst I think. Basically someone will create a brand new account, and assign this program to it.
The account will jump into Co-Op VS AI. 
Will select a random champion form the free to play list, will forever run the same summoners (Ghost - Heal)
And will usually buy boots, or nothing.

Then Bots have a few programs they can follow/do.
Follow script.
- The bot will follow another random player in the game, including if its also another bot.
And will follow that champion and wont do anything. Wont use spells wont do anything.
Mid Lane script.
- Will run down mid lane forever.
Lane script.
-Will attempt to lane and try and do will horrible basic shit.

There are a few others but there you go.

> [{quoted}](name=lordofrage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=16rAhpvl,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-01-02T11:53:48.447+0000)

Oh,those numbers are mana/energy consumption for the activation of each skill. To activate it you go to:
Settings -> Interface -> Ability and Attack Display (enable it)

and there you hate it.

Anything modding the files in LoL that affect the game itself, that is a bot program, or something that takes control of the game for you, is out of the question.

There are ways to mod the game files situated on your computer that do nothing more than change the visual aspects of the game and that is about it.

Now the real question, why are you asking this for, what is it you are trying to achieve by modding the game?
